en.pageTitle: Jason Wang - Cross-Platform Development, AI Integration, iOS/Android App Development Services | Software R&D Engineer
en.pageDescription: Professional software R&D engineer providing cross-platform development, AI integration, and native app development services. 3+ years team management experience, helping businesses reduce development costs and improve operational efficiency. Contact now for professional consultation.
en.name: Jason (Hsi-Chuan) Wang
en.aboutMeP1: Software R&D Engineer with approximately three years of team management experience, specializing in cross-platform development, backend services, and UI/UX design. I believe technology should solve real-world problems, not just be about writing code.
en.aboutMeP2: My core value is "delivering value, not just code." From proposing Server-Driven UI architecture and AI integration to user experience design, every project aims to solve problems and create value.
en.service1For: Startups and SMEs maintaining both iOS/Android apps
en.service1Result: Reduce 40% development time, accelerate feature rollout
en.service2For: Businesses wanting AI efficiency, teams needing automation
en.service2Pain: "Repetitive tasks consuming manpower? Want AI but don't know where to start?"
en.service2Result: Reduce 60% manual processing time, improve data accuracy
en.service3For: Product teams, businesses needing UX improvement
en.service3Pain: "Design-dev communication issues? Poor user feedback after launch?"
en.service3Result: Improve user satisfaction, reduce development rework
en.service4For: Businesses needing high-performance native iOS/Android apps
en.service4Pain: "Need stable, high-performance iOS/Android app? Unfamiliar with App Store process?"
en.service4Result: End-to-end service from development to launch, ensuring app quality
en.skillLangDesc: Python, JavaScript, Java, Swift, Kotlin, TypeScript, HTML/CSS
en.skillAPIsDesc: OpenAI Assistant, Google Maps, LINE Messaging, RESTful
en.skillToolsDesc: Git, Figma, GCP, Cursor IDE, Gemini-CLI
en.sideProject1Desc: Architected and deployed a scalable RESTful API on GCP using Node.js, PostgreSQL. Utilized Cursor IDE and Gemini-CLI to accelerate development and optimize code quality.
en.sideProject1Metrics: API response time <200ms, supporting 1000+ concurrent requests
en.sideProject2Desc: Developed an AI chatbot integrating OpenAI Assistant API and LINE Messaging API. Automated customer service processes to handle common questions, significantly reducing manual effort.
en.sideProject3Desc: Developed a custom Discord Bot to automate NFT ownership verification, performing on-chain wallet checks and automatically granting a 'Verified Holder' role upon success.
en.expHighlight2: Led multiple projects: Cross-Platform SDK, AI Tools, Mobile Apps
en.expHighlight3: ~3 years team management experience, proficient in Agile development
en.eduInfo: Ming Chi University of Technology - Electronic Engineering (2015-2020)
en.ctaSectionDesc: Whether it's cross-platform development, AI integration, or app development needs, I can provide professional solutions. Contact now and let's discuss how to turn your ideas into reality.

zh-TW.pageTitle: 王璽權 - 提供跨平台開發、AI 整合、iOS/Android App 開發服務 | Software R&D Engineer
zh-TW.pageDescription: 專業軟體研發工程師，提供跨平台開發、AI 整合、原生 App 開發服務。3+ 年團隊管理經驗，幫助企業降低開發成本、提升營運效率。立即聯繫獲取專業諮詢。
zh-TW.name: 王璽權 (Jason)
zh-TW.tagline: 交付價值，不只是程式碼
zh-TW.aboutMeP1: 擁有約三年團隊管理經驗的軟體工程師，專注於跨平台開發、後端服務和 UI/UX 設計。我相信技術應該解決實際問題，而不只是寫程式碼。
zh-TW.aboutMeP2: 我的核心價值是「交付價值，不只是程式碼」。從 Server-Driven UI 架構提案、AI 整合，到使用者體驗設計，每個專案都以解決問題和創造價值為目標。
zh-TW.service1For: 需要同時維護 iOS/Android 的新創公司、中小企業
zh-TW.service1Pain: 「您的 App 在 iOS/Android 上維護成本過高嗎？」
zh-TW.service1Result: 降低 40% 重複開發時間，加速功能上線
zh-TW.service2For: 想導入 AI 提升效率的企業、需要自動化流程的團隊
zh-TW.service2Pain: 「大量重複性工作消耗人力？想用 AI 但不知如何開始？」
zh-TW.service2Result: 減少 60% 人工處理時間，提升資料準確度
zh-TW.service3For: 產品團隊、需要改善使用者體驗的企業
zh-TW.service3Pain: 「設計與開發溝通不順？產品上線後使用者反應不佳？」
zh-TW.service3Result: 提升使用者滿意度，減少開發返工時間
zh-TW.service4For: 需要高效能原生 iOS/Android App 的企業
zh-TW.service4Pain: 「需要穩定、高效能的 iOS/Android App？不熟悉上架流程？」
zh-TW.service4Result: 從開發到上架一站式服務，確保 App 品質
zh-TW.skillLangDesc: Python, JavaScript, Java, Swift, Kotlin, TypeScript, HTML/CSS
zh-TW.skillAPIsDesc: OpenAI Assistant, Google Maps, LINE Messaging, RESTful
zh-TW.skillMgmtSub: 約三年經驗 • 敏捷開發 • 領導力
zh-TW.skillToolsDesc: Git, Figma, GCP, Cursor IDE, Gemini-CLI
zh-TW.sideProject1Desc: 在 GCP 上架構並部署可擴展的 RESTful API，使用 Node.js、PostgreSQL。運用 Cursor IDE 和 Gemini-CLI 加速開發流程並優化程式碼品質。
zh-TW.sideProject1Metrics: API 回應時間 <200ms，支援同時處理 1000+ 請求
zh-TW.sideProject2Desc: 開發 AI 聊天機器人，整合 OpenAI Assistant API 和 LINE Messaging API。自動化客戶服務流程，處理常見問題，顯著降低人力成本。
zh-TW.sideProject2Metrics: 處理超過 5,000 次客戶對話，回覆準確率 85%+
zh-TW.sideProject3Desc: 開發自訂 Discord Bot，自動化 NFT 持有權驗證，執行鏈上錢包驗證，驗證成功後自動授予「Verified Holder」角色。
zh-TW.sideProject3Metrics: 服務 3 個社群，驗證超過 500 位用戶，自動化率 100%
zh-TW.expHighlight2: 帶領跨平台 SDK、AI 工具、Mobile App 等多項專案
zh-TW.expHighlight3: 擁有約三年團隊管理經驗，熟悉敏捷開發流程
zh-TW.eduInfo: 明志科技大學 電子工程系 (2015-2020)
zh-TW.ctaSectionTitle: 準備開始您的專案了嗎？
zh-TW.ctaSectionDesc: 無論是跨平台開發、AI 整合，還是 App 開發需求，我都能為您提供專業的解決方案。立即聯繫，讓我們一起討論如何將您的想法變為現實。
